title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.4 - Incineration service charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.4 - Incineration service charges

State Regulations
(a) For each arrival of an aircraft in connection with a flight which originated
from or made an intermediate stop outside the continental limits of the United

States, other than hose originating in Canada or Puerto Rico, and if such
aircraft has not been cleared by the Bureau of Customs at another port of entry
to the United States prior to its arrival at the air terminal (whether or not
incineration services are actually used) on account of the availability of the
service of incinerating materials condemned by the Bureau of Entomology and

Plant Quarantine, the Bureau of Animal Industry or other controlling government
agencies............ $1.75
(b) Incineration services consuming more than one hour in connection with an
arrival of an aircraft: For each succeeding hour or fraction thereof after the
first hour............ $2

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1263.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
